name: Solitaire - Grand Journey
description:
It's high time to take a break and relax after a hard working day!

Solitaire - Grand Journey. This is an amazing card game that in a blink of an eye puts you to the atmosphere of adventure. You will feel both the euphoria of the jungle and the excitement of card games.
The game is absolutely free, so you can enjoy its gameplay and interfaces immediately.

There are a huge number of bonuses that will make you happy with each next level. The quantity and quality of these bonuses directly depends on the time you spend in this game. The more you play, the more bonuses you have! You want to be the first among your friends and mates who will finish Solitaire - Grand Journey, aren’t you?

Don’t be afraid that you won’t understand the game interface. The simplest gameplay of the “solitaire” makes it possible from the first second to enjoy traveling around the islands, endless wanderings through the caves in search of the sacred way out, and a breathtaking undersea full of secrets and unexpected mysteries.

In addition to all above, you get colorful graphics and a high-quality design, which helps focus on the game process. It just helps while away the time and at the same time training attention, manual dexterity and logical thinking!

The main purpose of the game is to earn gold. This is your everything. The more you get, the stronger you become!

You can play Solitaire - Grand Journey in public transport, at home, at work breaks, at class breaks or just on a day off. It doesn’t strain the mind or brain, allowing to have light training. You both enjoy and relax.
A distinctive factor is the fact that the game helps to be filled with adventures, but doesn’t slip you into the game world so much that it is impossible to stop. You can stop playing at any time. But don’t forget about bonuses that you can lose. They can become the main factor of your advantage over rivals!

Have fun at any moment of your life, and play Solitaire - Grand Journey to find it where others could not even imagine that it exists!
